name: BBCWorld
text:
“It’s amazing how those mail-in ballots are so one-sided”

Donald Trump claims that mail-in ballots are fraudulent: “It’s a corrupt system, and it makes people corrupt even if they aren’t by nature”

He has provided no credible evidence of this

https://t.co/fVQ13KG8wT https://t.co/6KAYv9GU3w

name: BBCWorld
text:
"The vote is sacred"

Joe Biden says "each ballot must be counted" and calls on people to be patient with the US election result, as votes are counted through the night in several states https://t.co/XgwBCcff5O https://t.co/6B9eZr0U3D

name: BBCWorld
text:
“We can both claim the states, but ultimately I have a feeling judges are going to have to rule”

Donald Trump alleges fraud - without any evidence: “There has been a lot of shenanigans and we can’t stand for that in our country”

https://t.co/fVQ13KG8wT https://t.co/K8nArjuYOP

name: BBCWorld
text:
RT @BBCBreaking: Donald Trump accuses political rivals of trying to “steal” the election, without any credible evidence

Votes are still being counted in #Election2020

https://t.co/ft4HqwfOIX https://t.co/83gjSiAiES
